The voluptuous, green-skinned redhead was wearing her usual outfit of a leafy leotard and various vines running up her legs and down her arms, green gloves and boots covering her hands and feet, a few flowers decorating her beautiful long red hair.

"H-Hey, th-this is just a job, lady!" the worker protested, sweating nervously, "I-I n-need money and-!"

"Shush," the ecoterrorist put a finger to his lips, "Allow me to understand if I have this correct. You've come here to murder defenseless plants in order to get paid with money, which is made from the skin of other trees that people, like you, have massacred, just so a greedy corporation can build a filthy structure here, likely also using the corpses of helpless plants to create it."

"...well, when you put it like that-" "Hmph. Just like a human. Only thinking of your own satisfaction, never considering the butchery perpetrated to-!" "HEY RED!"

Ivy paused, furrowing her brow as she recognized the voice interrupting her. Turning her head, she noticed-"Harley? ...What are you wearing?"

"Ya like it?" she grinned, striking a little pose with one hand on her hip, the other holding up the gun in the air. This had the side effect of exposing a bit more of her underwear through the slit in her skirt.

"Yeah..." the construction worker said, nodding dumbly as he looked at the sexy villainess. A glare from Ivy had him quickly reevaluating his opinion, "Uh, I'm shutting up now."

"Anyway," Ivy turned her gaze back to her odd friend, "Why are you dressed like...that?"

"Eh, Mr. J blew up my outfit. But that's why I'm here!" Harley grinned widely as she pointed the gun at Ivy, "I just gotta test somethin'!" A manic smile on her face, Harley pulled the trigger and...

1133322.content:
The Joker hunted through the 'Wayne Tech, Research Dept.'. He was hunting for something different, rumours reaching him about a new type of gun. Harley followed dutifully behind him, enjoy the flashes of his taut ass through the cut back of his coat.

Running her hands over her skin-tight red and black catsuit, she was only too aware of her curves. The swell of her hips forcing her into that swaying sashay of a walk. Moving with the feline grace of a gymnast, she was aware of her allure. It just wasn't as powerful, as Mista J's insane strength.

He was muttering to himself, as he lead the way. Idly Harley switched to scratching the head of one of the hyenas at her side. A low growl of appreciation drew a needy whine from the one on her other side. Raking her nails through his thick coat, soon he was as happy.

Even though her hands were busy, scratching her pets, her eyes still roamed over the work surfaces. Joker was focused, while she was more open, hunting for something, for anything that'd catch her attention, that'd please her.

Harley's hands ran over something that looked kinda like a gun. She paused to examine it in more detail. One hyena whined for the scratching to continue, but Harley had found something fascinating.

12.content:
Chaos is erupting in Gotham city. Throughout it all Batman and the gang are doing their best in holding off Harley, Sondra Fuller, , and Poison Ivy. Together, they created the group going by the city Sirens. Despite that, not many girls joined their group. Shiva wouldn't dare think of allying herself with a bunch of rebellious criminals. Catwoman was off, probably to pawn off a rare jewel from a rich family. She probably wasn't interesting in all the havoc the Sirens would bring.

Together, they managed to cause mischief and wonder throughout the Gotham streets. Poison Ivy was able to use her pheromones to make the guards steal the money for her. Sondra took on forms of various heroine to gain the people's trust in handing over their jewelry and items. In the end, the group would hide before Batman and any other Gotham hero showed up. Times like these have been fun.

Batgirl and Nightwing tailed them one night and managed to interfere with their current heist. Poison Ivy and Harley were going to pose as bellhops and sneak in to see a famous popster. Luckily, Dick happened to be there when he noticed how suspicious the two looked. Harley kept ruining her disguise by acting all surprised at everything around her. Heading to the bathroom, Dick Grayson slips into his Nightwing costume and calls Batman for help.

It doesn't take long for the dark knight to arrive, as he was just a few blocks over on a date. Batman makes his way inside the hotel and gets the drop on the girls. Shocked, Harley and Poison Ivy try to fight back with plants and hidden guns. Deciding to call it off, the two of them make a run for it.

Batman does his best to catch up with the group, but Harley constantly gets in his way. With each batarang sent at the girls, Harley has been able to deflect them off with her pop-guns. Every now and then, she sticks her tongue at at the bat-family, irritating them. "See red, I told ya we didn't need help in this heist". She is skilled in toying with her enemies.

Heading to the parking lot, the two rebellious femme-fatales work towards thinking of a plan. Now that the bat-family is present, they need to make their escape. After all, Arkham is not a place they want to revisit.

Getting to the driver's seat, Pamela gives a sigh of relief. Starting up the car, she watches as Harley gets into the passenger seat. Harley smiles at the thought of a chase happening, even though the two wanted to meet the popstar.

Harley gets lost in thought as the chase continues. She does her best to think of something she could really use. Perhaps then, things will be easier. Poison Ivy does her best to steer through traffic. Looking over to her partner in crime, Harley Quinn says "Ya know what we need? Quinnades"

Poison Ivy gets confused "Quinnades? What's that?" She works hard towards driving through the streets and figuring out what Harley wants.

"It's something I thought up. I want something that can be like Mr. J's Joker venom. Ya know, something that can bring a smile to everyone's face, but better."

"Hmm, not bad Harley. Maybe with my plants, we can get them to be under our control." Poison Ivy ponders on it. "There's so many possibilities."

Harley Quinn gets eager at Pamela supporting the idea. "They could even act like me." She then places both her hands together on the side of her cheek. "Oh, the fans I'll have wanting to be me."

"It's a good idea, Harley, but for now we got to deal with the bat and the bird." Pam continues to speed through traffic and away from the heroes.

Harley Quinn then states "Oh forget about them, red." She then looks over to the road in front of her. "We've got an idea to work on."
12.title: Harley- Working with Poison Ivy.

choices: "I want one too" Harley gulps down what's left of the liquid.
125.content:
Poison Ivy gently caressed one of the plants in her greenhouse. Holding its delicate leaf in her hand she kissed it gently before harvesting its flower. "Sorry baby, but its for a good cause." She took a few steps toward her work bench. Various beakers bubbled under a flame, she kept her eyes on their temperature reading as she ground up the flower. Everything needed to be meticulous and perfect.for her new bioweapon. With the perfectly measured powdered flower she began scooping the dust into the mixture when a loud crash rang though her hideout. The green skinned woman tensed up and clenched her jaw. The crashing soon lead into shattering glass before falling silent.

"Harley!" Poison Ivy shouted. Her precious flower dust scattered on the ground.

"Heya Red!" Harley cheerfully called out as she barged into the greenhouse.

"Do I even want to know what you broke coming in?" Poison Ivy sighed.

"Don't worry so much it wasn't yours.. well the window was." Harley laughed as she peeked over Poison Ivy's shoulder. "Whatcha workin on Red."

"A new iteration of my pheromones, mixed with a growth agent for my plants. If it works my babies will spread throughout Gothem and their pollen will leave its citizens under my spell."

"Sounds like fun. Can it be under my spell too?" Harley said striking a pose.

"Why are you doing that?"

"Cause that's how you look when, you go off on your big villain speeches Red."Harley laughed

Ivy's serious expression broke and she laughed with Harley. "Okay I wouldn't want my pheromones to affect you. You're mindless enough as it is." Ivy grabbed Harley's hand and quickly pricked her finger drawing blood.

'Oww what was that for Red?" Harley cried.

"I just need a sample of your blood to work with." Poison Ivy said dismissively as she saunters off back to work.

Hours pass with Ivy diligently at work and Harley impatiently swinging from the rafters,taunting the man eating plants, and asking a million questions about the process and if the plants can have smiley faces.

"There." Poison Ivy said triumphantly holding up a beaker of glowing green liquid. "Anything this touches will sprout pheromone producing new life."

"Ohh let me see!" Harley yelled snatching at the liquid. Poison Ivy stumbled backwards and the beaker spilled on her.

Poison Ivy gasped in shock and looked at Harley furiously before her body began to react violently. Her plant like skin bulged at her hips and roots coiled out from her and twisted around her waist. Harley watched in awe as Poison Ivy fell to the floor moaning in ecstasy as her clothing ripped apart, revealing the biggest change. Harley's eyes went wide.

"Oh my god Red, its huge." Harley said blushing a little.

"What is?"Poison Ivy looked down the the rots had disappeared but protruding from her pussy was a large throbbing green cock. It dripped with a sappy precum that smelled sweet like her pheromones.

"This is horrible Harley, Look what you did to me." Poison Ivy said in shock.

"Are you kidding this is even better than your plan Red. In fact..."

info.brief_description: Follow the world of Harley Quinn (or one of her relatives). See what mishaps happen.
info.description:
From the world of Batman, we follow Harley Quinn. The girl who fell in love with the Joker. Who knows what craziness will happen to her. Just about anything is allowed to happen here. Just don't kill Harley (or you know... the main character).
Or shall we follow her grand-kids, Dee and Dee (as they are called).

Have fun, feel free to add how ever you want.

Try to keep with what happened before. No singular choice chapters. Please try to keep good grammar and spelling.
